DOC.brief_title: Pilot Study Budesonide Patients With Primary Sclerosing Cholangitis
DOC.detailed_description: PROTOCOL OUTLINE : Patients receive budesonide mouth 3 time daily minimum 6 month . If liver biochemistry become normal , dosage reduce daily . Treatment discontinue 1 year .
